headline: IQVIA celebrates Marie E. Lamont and Dr. Joanne Hackett, winners of Healthcare Businesswomen's Association Awards
summary: RESEARCH TRIANGLE PARK, N.C., April 28, 2025--IQVIA™ (NYSE:IQV), a leading global provider of clinical research services, commercial insights and healthcare intelligence to the life sciences and healthcare industries, announced today that Marie E.
